languages.text: "Я бы сказал, что "союзники" здесь весьма щедрое слово, Ваша Светлость. "Пока еще не прикончившие нас враги", звучит более подходяще реалиям Комморры".

traits.locale_text: "Я бы сказал, что "союзники" здесь весьма щедрое слово, Ваша Светлость. "Пока еще не прикончившие нас враги", звучит более подходяще реалиям Комморры".
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "'Allies' would be a generous choice of words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. 'Enemies who haven't killed us yet' is a more fitting term in the world of Commorragh."
languages.original_text: "Я бы сказал, что "союзники" здесь весьма щедрое слово, Ваша Светлость. "Пока еще не прикончившие нас враги", звучит более подходяще реалиям Комморры".

traits.locale_text: "'Allies' is a generous choice of words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. 'Enemies who haven't killed us yet' is the term one should use in the world of Commorragh."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "'Allies' is a generous choice of words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. 'Enemies who haven't killed us yet' is the term one should use in the world of Commorragh."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "'Allies' would be a generous choice of words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. 'Enemies who haven't killed us yet' is a more fitting term in the world of Commorragh."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "'Allies' would be a generous choice of words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. 'Enemies who haven't killed us yet' is a more fitting term in the world of Commorragh."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

traits.locale_text: "'Allies' would be a generous choice of words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. 'Enemies who haven't killed us yet' is a more fitting term in the world of Commorragh."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: 「同盟国とは言葉の選択としては寛大ですね、陛下。コモラフの世界では、『まだ我々を殺していない敵』という言葉の方がふさわしい」
languages.original_text: "'Allies' would be a generous choice of words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. 'Enemies who haven't killed us yet' is a more fitting term in the world of Commorragh."

traits.locale_text: 「同盟国とは言葉の選択としては寛大ですね、陛下。コモラフの世界では、『まだ我々を殺していない敵』という言葉の方がふさわしい」
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: “‘盟友’这个词恐怕有点言过其实了，大人。‘还没有杀死我们的敌人’这个词，在科摩罗可能更合适。”
languages.original_text: "'Allies' would be a generous choice of words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. 'Enemies who haven't killed us yet' is a more fitting term in the world of Commorragh."

traits.locale_text: “‘盟友’这个词恐怕有点言过其实了，大人。‘还没有杀死我们的敌人’这个词，在科摩罗可能更合适。”
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: «"Aliados" sería una generosa elección de palabras. "Enemigos que aún no nos han matado" es un término más apropiado en el mundo de Commorragh».
languages.original_text: "'Allies' would be a generous choice of words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. 'Enemies who haven't killed us yet' is a more fitting term in the world of Commorragh."

traits.locale_text: «"Aliados" sería una generosa elección de palabras. "Enemigos que aún no nos han matado" es un término más apropiado en el mundo de Commorragh».
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "'Verbündete' wäre eine großzügige Wortwahl, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. 'Feinde, die uns noch nicht getötet haben' ist in der Welt von Commorragh eine passendere Umschreibung."
languages.original_text: "'Allies' would be a generous choice of words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. 'Enemies who haven't killed us yet' is a more fitting term in the world of Commorragh."

traits.locale_text: "'Verbündete' wäre eine großzügige Wortwahl, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. 'Feinde, die uns noch nicht getötet haben' ist in der Welt von Commorragh eine passendere Umschreibung."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: « Alliés est un bien grand mot, Votre Seigneurie. Sur Commorragh, on aurait plutôt tendance à dire "ennemis qui n'ont pas encore décidé de nous tuer". »
languages.original_text: "'Allies' would be a generous choice of words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. 'Enemies who haven't killed us yet' is a more fitting term in the world of Commorragh."

traits.locale_text: « Alliés est un bien grand mot, Votre Seigneurie. Sur Commorragh, on aurait plutôt tendance à dire "ennemis qui n'ont pas encore décidé de nous tuer". »
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis

languages.text: "'Müttefik' diyerek nezaket gösteriyorsunuz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. 'Bizi henüz öldürmemiş düşmanlar', Commorragh dünyasına daha uygun düşen bir tanım olur."
languages.original_text: "'Allies' would be a generous choice of words, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. 'Enemies who haven't killed us yet' is a more fitting term in the world of Commorragh."

traits.locale_text: "'Müttefikler' diyerek kelime seçiminde çok cömert davranmış olursunuz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. 'Bizi henüz öldürmemiş düşmanlar', Commorragh dünyasına daha uygun düşen bir tanım olur."
traits.speaker: SergeantVigastis
